page.title: 16TRADE (1)
page.content: {Shops 1.Sheila's Shop - sells mainly ladies fashion and accessories stocked from London and Leicester. 2.Crusty Cob - bakers, selling bread and cakes baked in Willingham. 612 loaves supplied each week. 3.Bob's Grocery Store. 4.Taylor's Grocers Shop. 5.Butcher. 6.Post Office and Shop - sells stationery, confectionery, magazines, newspapers(which can be delivered) There is also a film developing and dry cleaning service. 7.Ms Cook - farmshop, greengrocer and 'egg' lady. 8.Images - hairdressers. {Local Businesses 9.Garage - sells cars (mostly second hand), servicing, M.O.T.s, 2 pumps. 10.Coal Merchant
